channel.title: Linux on Some Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Some Notes

item.title: Iptables转发
item.description: iptables 常用命令 iptables -I INPUT -p tcp --dport 1234 -j ACCEPT iptables -I INPUT -p udp --dport 1234 -j ACCEPT iptables -t nat -nvL #查看nat链 iptables -t nat -N MY_TCP #在nat表上新建名为MY_TCP自定义链 iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -j MY_TCP #将MY_TCP
